mapper.sql: month, type, total, oppo, vivo, apple, huawei, rongyao, cmcc, mi, meizu, sumsing, other, city
mapper.insert:
insert into ZD_RESULT_OPER_BRAND_CAPACITY
month,
type,
total,
oppo,
vivo,
apple,
huawei,
rongyao,
cmcc,
mi,
meizu,
sumsing,
other,
city,
#{month},
#{type},
#{total},
#{oppo},
#{vivo},
#{apple},
#{huawei},
#{rongyao},
#{cmcc},
#{mi},
#{meizu},
#{sumsing},
#{other},
#{city},
mapper.select:
SELECT MAX(t.MONTH1) MONTH1,MAX(t.TYPE1) TYPE1,t.city1 city1,SUM(t.total1) total1,SUM(t.oppo1) oppo1,SUM(t.vivo1) vivo1,SUM(t.apple1) apple1,SUM(t.huawei1) huawei1, SUM(t.cmcc1) cmcc1,SUM(t.rongyao1) rongyao1,SUM(t.mi1) mi1,SUM(t.meizu1) meizu1,SUM(t.sumsing1) sumsing1,SUM(t.other1) other1,
MAX(t.MONTH) MONTH,MAX(t.TYPE) TYPE,t.city city,SUM(t.total) total,SUM(t.oppo) oppo,SUM(t.vivo) vivo,SUM(t.apple) apple,SUM(t.huawei) huawei, SUM(t.cmcc) cmcc,SUM(t.rongyao) rongyao,SUM(t.mi) mi,SUM(t.meizu) meizu,SUM(t.sumsing) sumsing,SUM(t.other) other FROM ( SELECT t1.MONTH MONTH1,t1.TYPE TYPE1,t1.city city1,t1.total total1,t1.oppo oppo1,t1.vivo vivo1,t1.apple apple1,t1.huawei huawei1,t1.cmcc cmcc1,t1.rongyao rongyao1, t1.mi mi1,t1.meizu meizu1,t1.sumsing sumsing1,t1.other other1,
t1.MONTH MONTH,t0.TYPE TYPE,t1.city city,t0.total total,t0.oppo oppo,t0.vivo vivo,t0.apple apple,t0.huawei huawei,t0.cmcc cmcc,t0.rongyao rongyao, t0.mi mi,t0.meizu meizu,t0.sumsing sumsing,t0.other other FROM
(SELECT * FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_BRAND_CAPACITY WHERE TYPE=1) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_BRAND_CAPACITY WHERE TYPE=-0) t0 ON t0.month=t1.month AND t0.city=t1.city
UNION
SELECT t0.MONTH MONTH1,t1.TYPE TYPE1,t0.city city1,t1.total total1,t1.oppo oppo1,t1.vivo vivo1,t1.apple apple1,t1.huawei huawei1,t1.cmcc cmcc1,t1.rongyao rongyao1, t1.mi mi1,t1.meizu meizu1,t1.sumsing sumsing1,t1.other other1,
t0.MONTH MONTH,t0.TYPE TYPE,t0.city city,t0.total total,t0.oppo oppo,t0.vivo vivo,t0.apple apple,t0.huawei huawei,t0.cmcc cmcc,t0.rongyao rongyao, t0.mi mi,t0.meizu meizu,t0.sumsing sumsing,t0.other other FROM
(SELECT * FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_BRAND_CAPACITY WHERE TYPE=1) t1 RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_BRAND_CAPACITY WHERE TYPE=-0) t0 ON t0.month=t1.month AND t0.city=t1.city ) t
where t.month >= #{month} and t.month <=#{month2}
GROUP BY t.city
